content:
Hi all!
Hope you are doing well :)
I saw zulip has its own docker-compose image, I read that it is better to use it locally, as a test server
is it possible to use that image on production without any problem? or better to build my own image?
or better in the classics?
It's fine to use that image in production -- there are certainly people who do so.
Pavel Yashchuk has marked this topic as resolved.

Hello there,
I following this guide to set up my development environment
https://github.com/zulip/docker-zulip

when I write docker-compose up

I get this never ending log
zulip_error.png

how can I fix it

I can share the yml file if needed
